content: is now at the side of the toe and ready for grafting cut yarn leaving a long tail 12 or 30cm will be more than enough and using a tapestry needle graft remaining stitches together using kitchener stitch finishing weave in ends and make a second sock enjoy your socks ©jenniferbeaulieu2024 patternforpersonaluseonly forquestions pleasecontactellyndriaknits@gmail com 7 inverse color charts ©jenniferbeaulieu2024 patternforpersonaluseonly forquestions pleasecontactellyndriaknits@gmail com 8
